product_name: Amphipod X-Tech Module Water Bottle and Mount
long_description: Add a water bottle to any waistpack or hydration belt for your long training runs. This bottle has an ergonomic shape that's easy to hold, and it stays securely in its mount in between drinks.
short_description: Add a water bottle to any waistpack or hydration belt for your long training runs. This bottle has an ergonomic shape that's easy to hold, and it stays securely in its mount in between drinks.
